pli-tv-bu-vb-np7:2.3.2: [Sp.1.526](): _Sesakaṃ āharissāmīti dve cīvarāni katvā sesaṃ puna āharissāmīti attho_, “_Sesakaṃ āharissāmi_: the meaning is that he says, ʻAfter making two robes, I will return the remainder.ʼ”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np7:2.3.3: Presumably this refers to any leftover cloth after the robe(s) have been made.
